NEWS: The IRS has moved Tax Day to JULY 15th. 
People and businesses have until July 15th to file and make payments on both state and federal taxes without penalty.

Due to the COVID-19 crisis, deadlines for personal income taxes have been extended to July 15 for both state and federal tax returns. This deadline extension will help alleviate the financial stress that families may face.

Learn more ⬇️

https://www.abqjournal.com/1434588/nm-postpones-tax-deadlines.html
